about_the_game:
Rock into Romance with Elizabeth, the Fiery Rockstar!

Experience the Thrill of Rockstar Romance with Elizabeth

Embark on a electrifying romantic journey with Elizabeth, a rockstar with a romantic soul. This captivating content invites you to explore a world of music, passion, and backstage drama as you connect with this fiery and dreamy character.

About Elizabeth:

  • Rock 'n' Roll Dates: Experience unforgettable dates filled with music, energy, and backstage excitement.

  • Shared Passions: Discover Elizabeth's love for music, performing, and the rock 'n' roll lifestyle, and share your own passions with her.

  • Romantic Moments: Create lasting memories as you build a strong emotional connection with Elizabeth.

  • Stunning Visuals: Immerse yourself in beautifully environments and character designs that bring Elizabeth's world to life.

Perfect for Fans of:

  • Romantic visual novels

  • Dating simulators

  • Rock music

  • Dramatic love stories

Don't miss your chance to experience the thrill of Elizabeth's story. Purchase the DLC today and start your own rock 'n' roll romance!

Elizabeth is a rockstar with a romantic soul. She dominates the stage with fiery energy and dreams of legendary love.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains full nudity, front and back of several all characters

You can set up a scene and simulate sex with a 3D model.

The animations simulate sexual positions, and it is possible to move the camera freely around the scene, having a complete perspective of the sexual act.

There is nothing forced in the game.

All situations and characters were made just to simulate pleasure in a passionate and light way.

It is possible to see in detail the characters facial expressions and erogenous zones, including genitalias. 

You must be legal age of majority or over to play this game.
